actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code, to modify the termination date for veterans eligible for educational assistance provided under such chapter.

summary.text: Permits the use of educational assistance by a veteran beyond the December 31, 1989 delimiting period if such assistance is used within five years of discharge from active service.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code, to modify the termination date for veterans eligible for educational assistance provided under such chapter.
